properties.entry: delete from binary_data where (event_id is null and classifier_id is null and record_id is null) and status = ?::approval_state and create_date < ?
delete from character_data where (event_id is null and classifier_id is null and record_id is null) and status = ?::approval_state and create_date < ?
select coalesce((select id from binary_data where id = ? and field = ?), null)
select coalesce((select id from character_data where id = ? and field = ?), null)
select exists(select 1 from binary_data where id = ?::uuid)
select exists(select 1 from character_data where id = ?::uuid)
select data, filename, mime_type, create_date, update_date, created_by, updated_by, classifier_id, record_id, field, size, status, event_id, id from binary_data where id = ?
select data, filename, mime_type, create_date, update_date, created_by, updated_by, classifier_id, record_id, field, size, status, event_id, id from character_data where id = ?
update binary_data set data = ?, filename = ?, mime_type = ?, update_date = ?, updated_by = ? where id = ? and status = ?::approval_state and event_id = ?
update character_data set data = ?, filename = ?, mime_type = ?, update_date = ?, updated_by = ? where id = ? and status = ?::approval_state and event_id = ?
insert into binary_data (id, data, filename, mime_type, field, create_date, created_by, size, status, event_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?::approval_state, ?)
insert into character_data (id, data, filename, mime_type, field, create_date, created_by, size, status, event_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?::approval_state, ?)
delete from binary_data where id = ? and field = ?
delete from character_data where id = ? and field = ?
update binary_data set record_id = ?, classifier_id = ?, event_id = ?, status = ?::approval_state where id = ? and status = ?::approval_state
update character_data set record_id = ?, classifier_id = ?, event_id = ?, status = ?::approval_state where id = ? and status = ?::approval_state
